name: cluster_workstation
title: Cluster Workstation
summary: Sets up a cluster workstation which you can access by running with the --ssh or --allow-ssh flags

inputSpec.help: The maximum length of time to keep the workstation running.  Value should include units of either s, m, h, d, w, M, y for seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, or years respectively.
inputSpec.label: Maximum Session Length (suffixes allowed: s, m, h, d, w, M, y)
inputSpec.name: max_session_length

inputSpec.label: Files
inputSpec.help: An optional list of files to download to the cloud workstation on startup.
inputSpec.name: fids
